title: Episode 52: Racism and Health (with Dr. Regan Gurung)
itunes:author: UW-Green Bay Psychology Department
itunes:summary: In this episode Drs. Ryan Martin and Regan Gurung discuss the toll racism can take on those who have been impacted. They look at the impact on both stress and health of people who are discriminated against.
itunes:subtitle: In this episode Drs. Ryan Martin and Regan Gurungâ€¦
